meta.name: Tutorial Web Design System
meta.purpose: Single source of truth for all component and visual styles. AI and developers must follow this when building or extending the application. Use this file when developing new features.
meta.techStack: React, Vite, Tailwind CSS. Section backgrounds use PRIMARY_BG from src/design-tokens.js.
meta.typography: Primary (display/headings): Cormorant Garamond. Secondary (body/UI): Outfit. Implement via index.css and tailwind.config.js.
meta.colorSourceOfTruth: Section background: PRIMARY_BG (#EFECE9). Tailwind tokens: primary-bg, hero-panel, dark-teal, deep-blue, dark-charcoal, body-text, footer-text, header-bar (hex values must match this file).

designPrinciples: Use PRIMARY_BG (#EFECE9) for all section backgrounds so the site stays visually consistent.
Headings and primary UI elements use dark teal (#3C5759). Deep blue (#143852) is used for hero/subtitles and some headings.
Body text and descriptions use gray #4b5563. Keep line-height relaxed (1.6) for readability.
Cards and hero panel use white (#FFFFFF) on the primary background for clear hierarchy.
Footer and primary buttons use dark teal (#3C5759). Footer text uses cool grey (#D0D5CE).
All interactive elements have consistent transitions (duration-base 200ms, focus rings on brand color).
UI copy is in Spanish (e.g. Inicio, Sobre Mí, Contacto, Reservar Cita).

primaryBackground.usage: Hero section bg, Services, Testimonials, CTA, Header nav/inner area, mobile dropdown, About section, Contact section. MUST use PRIMARY_BG from design-tokens.js in code.
primaryBackground.name: Off-white / Primary web color

heroPanel.usage: Hero inner card, cards, form containers, button contrast

darkTeal.usage: Section headings, nav links, primary buttons, footer background, icons, labels, borders/focus, card titles

deepBlue.usage: Hero subtitle area text, some headings (e.g. ColorPreview), carousel arrow icons

darkCharcoal.usage: Button active state, gradient end (e.g. About image block gradient)

bodyText.usage: Paragraphs, descriptions, captions, form placeholder context

footerText.usage: Footer body text and links (on dark teal background)

fontFamilies.secondary: Outfit, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, Segoe UI, Roboto, Helvetica Neue, Arial, sans-serif

typography.import: Google Fonts: Cormorant Garamond (400-700, italic 400) for display/headings; Outfit (300-700) for body and UI. See index.css.

spacing.sectionVertical: py-20 (e.g. About, Services, Testimonials, CTA, Contact)

layout.sectionBackground: Always use style={{ backgroundColor: PRIMARY_BG }} for sections that share the primary web color.

header.outer: sticky top-0 z-50 bg-[#D0D5CE] border-b border-gray-200 shadow-sm
header.nav: max-w-container-max mx-auto px-6 h-20 flex items-center justify-between, backgroundColor: PRIMARY_BG
header.brandLink: text-2xl font-bold text-gray-600 font-primary hover:text-gray-700 transition-colors duration-base
header.navLink: px-4 py-3 text-base font-medium text-[#3C5759] hover:text-[#3C5759]/80 hover:bg-gray-50 rounded-lg transition-all duration-base
header.mobileDropdown: md:hidden border-t border-gray-200 shadow-lg, backgroundColor: PRIMARY_BG, max-w-container-max mx-auto px-6 py-4 space-y-2
header.mobileNavLink: block px-4 py-3 text-base font-medium text-[#3C5759] hover:bg-gray-50 rounded-lg

hero.grid: grid grid-cols-1 lg:grid-cols-2 gap-8 lg:gap-12 items-center
hero.eyebrow: text-sm font-medium tracking-widest uppercase text-[#3C5759]/70 mb-3 pb-1 border-b-2 border-[#3C5759]/30 inline-block
hero.title: text-4xl md:text-5xl font-bold text-[#3C5759] mb-6 font-primary leading-tight
hero.subtitleArea: text-[#143852] for left column wrapper; paragraph text-lg md:text-xl text-[#3C5759]/80 mb-8 leading-relaxed
hero.buttons: flex flex-col sm:flex-row gap-4; primary = btn-primary, secondary = btn-secondary

sectionTitle.spec: text-sm font-medium tracking-widest uppercase text-[#4b5563] mb-3 pb-1 border-b-2 border-[#3C5759] inline-block

card.spec: bg-white p-6 rounded-xl shadow-md border border-gray-200 transition-all duration-base

btnPrimary.spec: bg-[#3C5759] text-white px-6 py-3 rounded-lg font-semibold font-secondary text-base transition-all duration-base shadow-sm

btnSecondary.spec: bg-transparent text-[#3C5759] px-6 py-3 rounded-lg font-semibold font-secondary text-base border-2 border-[#3C5759] transition-all duration-base

about.listItem: flex items-center gap-3; icon circle w-5 h-5 rounded-full bg-[#3C5759], text white check; label text-base font-medium text-[#3C5759]
about.imageBlock: aspect-square bg-gradient-to-br from-[#3C5759] to-[#192524] rounded-lg, text white center; subtitle text-[#D0D5CE]

testimonials.section: py-20, backgroundColor: PRIMARY_BG, id testimonials (index.css reinforces #EFECE9)
testimonials.stars: flex items-center gap-1 mb-4, w-5 h-5 text-yellow-400
testimonials.author: font-semibold text-[#3C5759] font-primary

cta.heading: text-4xl font-bold text-[#3C5759] mb-6 font-primary
cta.buttons: flex flex-col sm:flex-row gap-4 justify-center; btn-primary, btn-secondary

contact.iconBox: w-12 h-12 rounded-lg bg-[#3C5759] flex items-center justify-center flex-shrink-0, icon w-6 h-6 text-white
contact.label: block text-sm font-medium text-[#3C5759] mb-2
contact.input: w-full h-12 px-4 rounded-lg border border-gray-300 focus:border-[#3C5759] focus:ring-2 focus:ring-[#3C5759]/10 outline-none transition-all duration-base
contact.textarea: w-full px-4 py-3 rounded-lg border border-gray-300 focus:border-[#3C5759] focus:ring-2 focus:ring-[#3C5759]/10 outline-none transition-all duration-base resize-vertical

footer.brandLink: text-2xl font-bold font-primary mb-4 block hover:text-[#D0D5CE] transition-colors duration-base

imageCarousel.slide: absolute inset-0 transition-opacity duration-500; active opacity-100, inactive opacity-0
imageCarousel.arrow: absolute top-1/2 -translate-y-1/2 bg-white/80 hover:bg-white text-[#143852] p-2 rounded-full shadow-lg transition-all duration-base z-10, left-4 / right-4, icon w-6 h-6
imageCarousel.dots: absolute bottom-4 left-1/2 -translate-x-1/2 flex gap-2 z-10
imageCarousel.dot: w-3 h-3 rounded-full transition-all duration-base; active bg-white w-8, inactive bg-white/50 hover:bg-white/75

forms.label: block text-sm font-medium text-[#3C5759] mb-2
forms.inputBase: rounded-lg border border-gray-300 focus:border-[#3C5759] focus:ring-2 focus:ring-[#3C5759]/10 outline-none transition-all duration-base
forms.inputHeight: h-12 for single-line, py-3 for textarea

guidelines.newSections: Use PRIMARY_BG from design-tokens.js for section background. Use container: max-w-container-max mx-auto px-6.
guidelines.newHeadings: Use section-title + section-heading + section-description pattern where applicable. Headings font-primary, color #3C5759.
guidelines.newCards: Use .card class (white bg, rounded-xl, shadow-md, border gray-200). Card titles text-[#3C5759] font-primary.
guidelines.newButtons: Use .btn-primary for main action, .btn-secondary for secondary. Same colors and borders as defined above.
guidelines.newForms: Labels text-[#3C5759], inputs with focus:border-[#3C5759] focus:ring-2 focus:ring-[#3C5759]/10.
guidelines.icons: On dark teal backgrounds use white fill/stroke. Size context: w-5 h-5 small, w-6 h-6 default, w-12 h-12 for feature icons in cards.
guidelines.accessibility: Maintain focus rings (focus:ring-2 focus:ring-[#3C5759]/10). Use aria-label on icon-only buttons. Sufficient contrast: body #4b5563 on white, #D0D5CE on #3C5759.
guidelines.language: User-facing copy is Spanish (Inicio, Sobre Mí, Contacto, Reservar Cita, etc.). Keep new UI strings in Spanish.
